## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G08620](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G08620)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATRH25, STRS2</u>
- **Gene Name:** RNA HELICASE 25, STRESS RESPONSE SUPPRESSOR 2
- **Description:**   DEA(D/H)-box RNA helicase family protein;(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
